extendedInfo.description: Airquality in Europe by CiteairDescription : Airquality in Europe is a Smartphone application that shows you the Airquality in 100 major european cities.  Paris, London, Berlin, Bruxel, Amsterdam, Romeâ¦The application provides you with the current airquality in the city, the airquality of yesterday as well as a forecast for tomorrow. FEATURES : â¢	Air quality in major european citiesâ¢	Common european indexâ¢	Airquality of the day is updated hourlyâ¢	Tomorrow forecastâ¢	Easy color codeâ¢	European projectSUPPORT :The project has been co-founded by the European Union's INTERREG IIIC and IVC Programme as an obligation under the EU Framework Directive on air quality. Started in 2004, CITEAIR supports European cities and regions in their efforts to meet limit values and improve the air quality for their citizens.For more information, please visit our website at  www.airqualitynow.eu If you have any questions, suggestions or encounter problems, please contact us at contact[at]airqualitynow.eu

reviews.title: Pity
reviews.comment: Same problem as many other users reported: the app refuses to start on my Nexus 10 because the app is not just happy with the screen resolution. It\'s really a pity that this public european project is producing such a very low quality result. I had myself developed a little android widget to display the air quality of a city, but was denied the right to publish it, even though it was free (and that the data of Air Quality in Europe is supposed to be public) ...
reviews.author: Thomas Surrel

reviews.title: It doesnt work
reviews.comment: Installed it on Sony Xperia S and the app doesnt work. When I start it it your shows a notification that the screen resolution of my phone isn\'t high enough.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Still Not working
reviews.comment: Says that my galaxy note has too low resolution. Bug not fixed :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: not working on my new device
reviews.comment: the app is not maintained and is now useless
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Okay but should be improved
reviews.comment: Good that this kind of information is available this way but I do not see why the app needs GPS data, it only slows things down. Like to see also things like SO2, only PM2.5 is a bit decepting.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesn\'t work and GPS needed???
reviews.comment: Complains about resolution and stops. Fine-grained location is not needed for this app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Doesnt work
reviews.comment: It gives an error about the display on the HTC sensation
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not working on galaxy note
reviews.comment: Says my resolution is too low... Its huge!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Does not run on samsung tablet 7\" Only wxga

reviews.title: Simply refuses to work
reviews.comment: Poorly written - it complains about resolution (that it should be at least 320x480) on galaxy nexus (which has1280x720)...

reviews.title: Resolution bug still there
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t run on One-S, says resolution too low.
reviews.author: Jeroen V

reviews.comment: Sagt, dass die  Bildschirmaufl\303\266sung zu gering ist. So ein Quatsch.
